rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall leading to the central courtyard.
Spacious living room with traditional Kerala-style decor and Vastu-aligned orientation. East-facing to harness positive energy.
Modern kitchen integrated with traditional elements, west-facing for balance per Vastu principles.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the kitchen with open access to courtyard for natural ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance gate aligned with Vastu to welcome positive energy.
A traditional Kerala window providing natural light and ventilation.
Door connecting kitchen to dining room for efficient service flow.

rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with an attached bathroom and balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Secondary bedroom offering a peaceful retreat with south-facing windows for optimum lighting.
Study area designed with traditional Kerala motifs and adequate storage.
Small dressing/alcove room adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience.

openings.description: Door leading to a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard.
Traditional window that provides natural light and fresh air.

central_courtyard.description: A central courtyard serving as the heart of the Nalukettu layout with a water feature and garden area that promotes natural ventilation and light.

plot.description: A plot facing west to ensure optimal sunlight distribution as per Vastu guidelines.
